Text:
Very good quality, would give the video 8 out of 10, and the audio 9 out of 10. 
The video does get pixelated in a few scenes, but doesnt really affect the viewing experience. Also, bit of a shame that the native aspect ratio is 4:3, (when viewed in vlc.)

Overall Rating: 9/10 
Best out there so far!
i think i hav to agree with the two timangssss.... neonrainbow and enjoy
